name: John Wayne Westerns Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: One of Wayne's best-known roles was in 'The Searchers'. Who played his fellow searcher?
questions.explanation:
Jeffrey Hunter.

	Searching for Natalie Wood.

questions.text: One of Wayne's best westerns may have been 'Rio Bravo'. Who was the prisoner that caused all the problems in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Claude Akins.

	With Dean Martin, Rick Nelson, Angie Dickinson and Walter Brennan.

questions.text: Who played the female lead in 'Red River'?
questions.explanation:
Joanne Dru.

	Monty Clift and Brennan.

questions.text: It was probably inevitable that Wayne would make 'The Alamo'. What role did he play?
questions.explanation:
Davy Crockett.

	With Richard Widmark, Laurence Harvey, Richard Boone.

questions.text: Could there be a more unlikely pairing than John Wayne and Shirley Temple?
Which of these John Wayne movies is a western?
In 'Tall in the Saddle', which regular Wayne co-star played the main 'bad guy'?
questions.explanation:
Ward Bond.

	Hayes was in the movie, too.

questions.text: Maureen O'Hara was a friend and frequent co-star with Wayne. In which of these movies did she appear with him?
Wayne reprised the role of Rooster Cogburn (From 'True Grit') in the sequel of the same name. Who played opposite him?
questions.explanation:
Katharine Hepburn.

	Hepburn ... in a western?

questions.text: In which movie did William Holden co-star with Wayne?
questions.explanation:
The Horse Soldiers.

	The Civil War.
